traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Osvaldo's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

actions.name: Chain
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) if Osvaldo isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Up to four chains Osvaldo can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under Osvaldo's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.

Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When Osvaldo uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if Osvaldo is {@condition incapacitated} or dies.
